name: Peasant'sQuest GB Demake (WIP)
description:
This Is a Gameboy Demake of a browser game called Peasant's Quest.

Original browser game made by Mike and Matt Chapman and Jonathan Howe at Homestarrunner.com. https://homestarrunner.com/disk4of12

I happened to make this while #gbcompo21 was running so I thought I'd post it.

Things are Work In Progress right now, just some intro stuff and a few maps.

This is my first time making a GameBoy game with GB Studio.
